welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Chilly-Mazarin, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful architecture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and time restrictions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving a variety of airlines including Air France, Lufthansa, and Qatar Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals and serving a variety of airlines including British Airways, Emirates, and Delta.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller and more basic terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines such as Ryanair and EasyJet.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds and unlimited data.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
